entry.title: OpenSSL Security Advisories - November 2022
entry.summary: Initial Publication Date: 2022/11/01 09:00 PDT AWS is aware of the recently reported issues regarding OpenSSL 3.0 (CVE-2022-3602 and CVE-2022-3786). AWS services are not affected, and no customer action is required. Additionally, Amazon Linux 1 and Amazon Linux 2 do not ship with OpenSSL 3.0 and ...
